title: Why Netflix, Hulu and Other Streaming Services Recommend Garbage---and How to Fix That
description: You’re scrolling and scrolling but find nothing to watch. It’s time to get your streaming service to know you better.

title: 12 Apps We Can't Stop Using, For Better or Worse
description: Are you addicted to your apps? That might not be such a bad thing. Our writers confess which ones have hooked them—from Hinge to Google Maps to BirdBuddy—and why they’re glad.

title: Want to Know if AI Will Take Your Job? I Tried Using It to Replace Myself
description: The ‘Cognitive Revolution’ will automate tasks done by hundreds of millions of workers. The best way to understand which of us will go first is direct experience with AI.
